trans-unit.target: TEXT_DUNGEONHALATALI_00000_BRONZEBULL_000_000<tab>The final test shall pit you against the finest gladiators ever to grace the bloodsands! Steel yourselves!
TEXT_DUNGEONHALATALI_00000_BRONZEBULL_000_001<tab>A glorious contest! I was hard-pressed to restrain myself from joining the fray!
